channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Here are the best Apple Watch deals available right now
item.description: Apple recently launched its latest fleet of smartwatches, including the Apple Watch Series 11, the SE 3, and the Ultra 3. Each wearable offers something a little different (their prices indicate their breadth of features). A new generation of watches means we probably won’t see big price drops soon, but we’re officially beginning our watch […]

item.title: One of the Best Horror Movies You’ve Not Seen Yet Finally Has a Release Date
item.description: It's called 'Obsession,' and it'll haunt your every waking moment in May 2026.

item.title: Disneyland just landed in Fortnite – here’s what you can explore starting tomorrow
item.description: Disneyland Game Rush, Fortnite’s first-ever Disney Parks experience, arrives tomorrow, November 6, 2025, as a Fortnite Creative island that looks a heck of a lot like the Disneyland Resort.

item.title: Tinder is Testing AI Features That Look Through Your Camera Roll
item.description: The feature is opt-in, but still raises concerns about privacy.

item.title: The Complete History of ‘Star Trek 4’ Not Happening
item.description: It's been a long road, getting from there to... well, nowhere.

item.title: Google Gemini’s Deep Research can look into your emails, drive, and chats
item.description: Gemini can now draw from your emails and documents while performing “deep research” queries. Google’s announcement blog called this “one of our most-requested features” for Gemini Deep Research, which is an agentic feature styled specifically for creating research reports rather than just answering questions. The chatbot starts by creating a multi-step research plan, then it […]...

item.title: China offers Alibaba and other domestic giants half-price data center energy if it picks chips from Huawei over Nvidia
item.description: China offers energy subsidies to tech giants using domestic chips, seeking AI independence while confronting efficiency and performance challenges.

item.title: The 5 hottest electric motorcycles from the EICMA 2025 show
item.description: Scooters look like the next big EV battleground, as big names turn to small capacity to drum up sales –here are all the highlights from EICMA 2025.

item.title: Google Nest Cam Outdoor (2025) Review: Gemini Just Lied Too Much
item.description: Unfortunately, Google's AI is really bad at looking at your video footage.

item.title: Kim Kardashian: ChatGPT made me fail my law exams
item.description: Kim Kardashian accused ChatGPT of causing her to fail her law exams, calling it "insane" in a recent interview with Vanity Fair.
